channel.title: Events on Apache Software Foundation Events
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Apache Software Foundation Events

item.title: Apache Conferences Calendar
item.description: Upcoming Apache events This is the list of upcoming official Apache events, and those events which have been approved to use Apache Marks under the Third Party Event Branding Policy. List loading For a complete list of events see our calendar. In addition to Official Apache Events, there are a wide range of other events which feature Apache projects and technologies.

item.title: Apache Conferences Calendar
item.description: This Calendar is maintained by the Apache Conferences Committee (ConCom). It’s used to list official Apache events, and those events which have been approved to use Apache Marks under the Third Party Event Branding Policy. This Calendar is also available as an iCal feed

item.title: Apache Past Events
item.description: Past ApacheCons For details on past ApacheCons, and archived sites of previous events (where available), please see https://archive.apachecon.com/ Information on past ApacheCons is also available on the ApacheCon Wiki
